name: Death Starter
description:
You are META-X the ships robot and you are the last hope.

Your ship the SS Hogarth has been infested by the Hive. 

You are not a battle droid so this is going to be tough, perhaps if you can hold out long enough you can be upgraded?

Either way you were built to serve... 

GOOD LUCK

Arrow keys to move

plays best in full screen, please leave feedback :)
